name: 海莉·格里菲斯
name_full: 海莉·格里菲斯 Hayley Griffith
introduction: Hayley Griffith is an NYC-based actress. She most recently starred Fangoria's horror-comedy, 'Satanic Panic.' She has appeared on various TV shows such as 'Bull,' 'The Loudest Voice,'  'Law & Order: SVU,' 'The Mysteries of Laura,' 'Sex&Drugs&Rock&Roll,' and 'All My Children.' She has also done various national commericals and voiceover spots.Some of Hayley's past theatre credits include Cecily in 'The Importance of Being Earnest,' Juliet in 'Romeo and Juliet,' Sarah in 'Translations,' and Olga in 'Olga' (reading at IRT Theatre). Hayley also received a Recommended Pass for her SAFD Skills Proficiency Test in Unarmed Stage Combat (2014).In her free time, Hayley enjoys singing, dancing mediocrely, knitting, painting, and most importantly, taking care of her Peruvian Guinea Pig, Wally, who is literally her life. And yes, IT IS as sad as it sounds!!
